      • hex

        public static java.lang.String hex(int value,
                                   int digits)
        Parameters:
        value - Integer to convert to a hexadecimal String.
        digits - Integer number of hexadecimal digits the hexadecimal String should contain.
        Returns:
        String which is the digits long hexadecimal representation of value.

      • padLeft

        public static java.lang.String padLeft(java.lang.String text,
                                       char c,
                                       int length)
        Parameters:
        text - String text to pad with characters from the left.
        c - Character to pad text with from the left.
        length - Integer length the resulting padded String should be.
        Returns:
        text padded with c characters from the left such that its length is length.

      • union

        public static <T extends java.util.Collection<U>,U> T union(java.util.Collection<T> collections)
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of Collection instances which will be unioned.
        U - Type of instance which the T instances contain.
        Parameters:
        collections - Collection of T instances to union.
        Returns:
        T at the first index of collections and which now contains the contents of all the other T instances in collections.
